    Me Portfolio Page

    Here I have collected several examples of my work, both real and practical. You can view the work online by clicking on the link to the GitHub.

    Lets Make Something Great Together

    I'm a Web Front End Developer who prides himself on being a strategic partner and an awesome product provider.

    I will be happy to join your project and help you realize your dream.

    There are no boundaries for perfection

    I am constantly improving my professional skills. In my spare time, I just animate site layouts. In my work, I try to use only clean code in modern standards. Maximum writing of your own scripts and minimum use of third-party libraries.
